english.segment1: Beautiful King, has anybody seen. Your glory unfold?. You walk up to me. with sparks in Your eyes, You brighten my world
english.segment2: And You'll always be my only One. You're the only God I'll ever love. because..
english.segment3: Every word that you say. wields the beauty of angels. Every smile is arrayed. with a joy like wedding bells. It's my heart you hold. Of your mystery I sing. I will stand and behold. my Beautiful King
english.segment4: Love of my soul, with power untold, who is like you?. Lamb that was slain, my God, You reign. in victory and truth.
english.segment5: And I'll follow You all my days. And I'll give to You every single thing. I hand everything over..
english.segment6: Every word that You say. wields the beauty of angels. Every smile is arrayed. with a joy like wedding bells. It's my heart You hold. Of your mystery i sing. I will stand and behold. my Beautiful King.
english.segment7: And time flies by. We're not standing alone. Every word that You say, Father, let it be known. I fall so fast. without You by my side. Let Your beauty be seen
english.segment8: Let Your glory unfold. Let Your glory unfold. Let Your glory unfold. Let Your glory unfold
english.segment9: Every word that You say. wields the beauty of angels. 'Cause every smile is arrayed. with a joy like wedding bells. It's my heart You hold. Of Your mystery i sing. I will stand and behold. my Beautiful King!!!
english.segment10: 'Cause every word that you say. wields the beauty of angels. 'Cause every smile is arrayed. with a joy like wedding bells. It's my heart You hold. Of your mystery i sing. I will stand and behold. my Beautiful King
